about_the_game:
"Don't play with me!"

''Silent:Abandoned'' is a short horror game. The plot of the game is simple to the point of banality, There are two brothers. They are vloggers. Michael And John. who love to vlog abandoned places, The game takes place in 2024.

"Silent:Abandoned" is a psychological horror in the genre of "walking simulator"

Average Time to Complete the Game: 60 Minutes

About the game.

They are two brothers. They are vloggers. Michael and John. who love to vlog abandoned places. One night they go to an abandoned house. They didn’t know what happened inside the house. So far, no one has been able to enter the house. Even very popular vloggers. When they go to the abandoned house. Michael walks in and gets stuck. And John suddenly disappears outside. Michael must try to save himself. Strange things happen inside that house. which has been taken over by the devils.

The year is 2024. The main character, Michael, Explore a mysterious ever-changing house in a slow-paced, atmospheric world that combines both uncannily comforting and horrifyingly realistic environments, and enjoy a genuinely terrifying experience.

Environment

The game is played in a abandoned house. It is a gloomy environment, you are alone at home, but what is interesting is where and why do these sounds that happen outside of you come from?

You will feel that your mind is interestingly disappearing.

Key Features

- The main genre of the game is "Walking Simulator";

- You have to take pictures of things to get proof;

- Bodycam experience;

- You can take pictures to gather evidence of the house;

- Gameplay is close to realism;

- Take your time, when exploring locations, secrets and plot notes may be hidden there;

WARNING:

Epileptic seizures associated with increased sensitivity to light are Possible. Some people may experience seizures when exposed to flashes of light and flashing images that appear in a video game. People who have not previously experienced such attacks may not be aware of their illness. A reasonable restriction of the game audience is recommended.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains images of scenes of violence that can have a negative impact on the psyche. Some content items may not be suitable for certain age categories. A reasonable restriction of the game audience is recommended.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 590 with 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
